Text: Mitigating climate change is one of the top priorities of the government, Guðmundur Ingi Guðbrandsson, Iceland's environment minister, told NBC News. We need to scale up our efforts and step up our game when it comes to solving the climate crisis. Iceland has pledged to cut its emissions by 40% by 2030 and aims to be carbon neutral by 2040.
Cause: Mitigating climate change is one of the top priorities of the government, Guðmundur Ingi Guðbrandsson, Iceland's environment minister, told NBC News.
Effect: Iceland has pledged to cut its emissions by 40% by 2030 and aims to be carbon neutral by 2040.
